name: a memoriam to a fallen furry friend
name_original: a memoriam to a fallen furry friend
description:
This is a twine memoriam for my puppy.

She died 4 days ago and i couldn't get her death off my mind. 
I hope you like this small little memoriam I made her, think of it as a vent piece.

Music used with permission by Exist Strategy, "Reverance," from the album, "Lie Still and Fade." (https://existstrategy.bandcamp.com/album/lie-still-and-fade)

Special thanks to Bagenzo on Discord for audio troubleshooting.

fly high, sleep tight pupper
2009-2021
